009package imagingbook.common.ransac;
010
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
012import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.AlgebraicEllipse;
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.GeometricEllipse;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.algebraic.EllipseFit5Points;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.algebraic.EllipseFitAlgebraic;
016import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.algebraic.EllipseFitFitzgibbonStable;
017
018/**
019 * <p>
020 * RANSAC detector for ellipses. See Sec. 12.1.5 of [1] for additional
021 * details.
022 * </p>
023 * <p>
024 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
025 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
026 * </p>
027 * 
028 * @author WB
029 * @version 2022/11/19
030 * 
031 * @see GeometricEllipse
032 * @see RansacDetector
033 */
034public class RansacEllipseDetector extends RansacDetector<GeometricEllipse> {
035        
036        /**
037         * Nested class extending {@link RansacDetector.RansacParameters} 
038         * to specify additional RANSAC parameters.
039         */
040        public static class Parameters extends RansacDetector.RansacParameters {
041                
042                /**
043                 * Constructor used to define default parameter values.
044                 */
045                public Parameters() {
046                        this.randomPointDraws = 1000;
047                        this.maxInlierDistance = 2.0;
048                        this.minInlierCount = 100;
049                }
050        }
051        
052        // constructors ------------------------------------
053        
054        /**
055         * Constructor using specific parameters.
056         * @param params RANSAC parameters
057         */
058        public RansacEllipseDetector(Parameters params) {
059                super(5, params);
060        }
061        
062        /**
063         * Constructor using default parameters.
064         */
065        public RansacEllipseDetector() {
066                this(new Parameters());
067        }
068        
069        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
070
071        @Override
072        GeometricEllipse fitInitial(Pnt2d[] points) {
073                EllipseFitAlgebraic fit = new EllipseFit5Points(points);
074                AlgebraicEllipse ellipse = fit.getEllipse();
075                return (ellipse == null) ?  null : new GeometricEllipse(ellipse);
076        }
077        
078        @Override
079        GeometricEllipse fitFinal(Pnt2d[] inliers) {
080                EllipseFitAlgebraic fit2 = new EllipseFitFitzgibbonStable(inliers);
081                AlgebraicEllipse ellipse = fit2.getEllipse();
082                return (ellipse == null) ?  null : new GeometricEllipse(ellipse);
083        }
084
085}
